    • generateRandomInts

      public int generateRandomInts​(int[] randArr, int min, int max)
      Parameters:
      randArr - : array name to generate it.
      min - : from which minimum number random method should start generating number
      max - : till which maximum number random method should generate number
      Returns:
      : give random number between ranges

    • remainingElements

      public void remainingElements​(int[] randArr, int minmax, int index)
      Parameters:
      randArr - : Take numbers (from an arrays) from the below methods to print remaining numbers after every search.
      minmax - : minmax identity from which index in the array this method should start printing method
      index - : index tell method till what index this method should print numbers

    • nonRecursiveBinarySearch

      public int nonRecursiveBinarySearch​(int[] randArr, int num, int max, int min)
      This method do iterative binary search.
      Parameters:
      randArr - : Take array from the main class.
      num - : What number is to be find.
      max - : What number is of first index.
      min - : What number is of last index.
      Returns:
      : if the number is found method return index number, if it's not found return -1.

    • recursiveBinarySearch

      public int recursiveBinarySearch​(int[] randArr, int num, int max, int min)
      This method do recursive binary search
      Parameters:
      randArr - : Take array from the main class.
      num - : What number is to be find.
      max - : What number is of first index.
      min - : What number is of last index.
      Returns:
      : if the number is found method return index number, if it's not found return -1.
